attributes.action: Supermarket "Key Workers" to be given Covid Vaccine priority
attributes.additional_details: Supermarket workers (Tesco, Asda etc) are in the face of the public daily and at very high risk of transmission and less protection than NHS, but yet our keyworker status is downgraded. We deserve help and support too! We can't furlough or stay at home, store colleagues have worked continously and tirelessly with the public since lockdown one to help keep the Nation fed and supplied at great risk to themselves and their families
attributes.background: Give essential workers (key workers when it suits) in supermarkets (Tesco, Asda etc) priority status and benefits, including the vaccine before the remaining general population

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
